00050 wxThread::ExitCode BoardWorkerThread::Entry( void)
00051 {
00052         const int SW_TRIGGER_INTERVAL_MSEC= 1;
00053         const int SAMPLES_READY_TIMEOUT_MSEC= 1000;
00054         wxDateTime samples_ready_timeout= wxDateTime::UNow();
00055         bool sample_ready= false;
00056         this->m_next_sw_trigger= wxDateTime::UNow();
00057         while( !this->TestDestroy())
00058         {
00059                 UINT32 num_samples_read;
00060                 UINT32 num_events;
00061                 //
00062                 // Get channels' samples
00063 
00064                 // Refresh channels' data cache
00065                 
00066                 num_samples_read= num_events= 0;
00067                 if( this->m_parent->ReadBoardData( &num_samples_read, &num_events))
00068                 {
00069                         if( num_samples_read)
00070                         {
00071                                 if( num_samples_read> (UINT32)this->m_parent->m_p_app_settings->m_max_log_X)
00072                                         num_samples_read= (UINT32)this->m_parent->m_p_app_settings->m_max_log_X;
00073 
00074                                 if(( this->m_parent->m_is_recording)&& ( this->m_parent->m_record_use_max_buffers))
00075                                 {
00076                                         if( ( --this->m_parent->m_record_max_buffers)< 0)
00077                                         {
00078                                                 // toggle mainform record button here
00079                                                 this->m_parent->m_is_recording= false;
00080                                                 wxCommandEvent event( wxEVT_RECORD_END_EVENT, BOARD_WORKER_THREAD_ID);
00081                                                 // Send it in a thread safe way
00082                                                 wxPostEvent( g_main_frame, event );
00083 
00084                                                 this->Sleep( 10);
00085                                         }
00086                                 }
00087 
00088                                 // 
00089                                 // Update samples ready timeout
00090                                 samples_ready_timeout= wxDateTime::UNow().Add( wxTimeSpan( 0, 0, 0, SAMPLES_READY_TIMEOUT_MSEC));
00091                                 for( size_t i= 0; ( i< this->m_parent->m_channel_array.GetCount())&& !this->TestDestroy(); i++)
00092                                 {
00093                                         PhysicalBoardChannel *board_channel= ( PhysicalBoardChannel *)this->m_parent->m_channel_array[i];
00094                                         if( board_channel->ReadSamplesCache( num_samples_read))
00095                                         {
00096                                                 if( this->m_parent->m_is_recording)
00097                                                         board_channel->RecordSamples( );
00098                                         }
00099                                         this->Sleep( 1);
00100                                 }
00101                                 if( this->m_parent->m_is_recording)
00102                                 {
00103                                         for( size_t i= 0; ( i< this->m_parent->m_virtual_channel_array.GetCount())&& !this->TestDestroy(); i++)
00104                                         {
00105                                                 VirtualBoardChannel *board_channel= ( VirtualBoardChannel *)this->m_parent->m_virtual_channel_array[i];
00106                                                 board_channel->RecordSamples( );
00107                                                 this->Sleep( 1);
00108                                         }
00109                                 }
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112                 else
00113                 {
00114                         num_samples_read= 0;
00115                 }
00116                 this->Sleep( 1);
00117                 //
00118                 // Check samples ready timeout
00119                 if( wxDateTime::UNow()>= samples_ready_timeout)
00120                 {
00121                         // Samples ready Timeout
00122                         if( sample_ready)
00123                         {
00124                                 sample_ready= false;
00125                                 // Reset main panel led
00126                                 this->m_parent->UpdateSamplesReadyLed( false);
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 else
00130                 {
00131                         if( !sample_ready)
00132                         {
00133                                 sample_ready= true;
00134                                 // Set main panel led
00135                                 this->m_parent->UpdateSamplesReadyLed( true);
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138                 //
00139                 // Software autoretrig.
00140                 if( this->TestDestroy())
00141                         goto exit_point;
00142                 if(( this->m_parent->m_p_app_settings->m_trigger_msk& (int)AppSettings::SW_AUTO_TRIGGER_MSK)&& !this->TestDestroy())
00143                 {
00144                         if( wxDateTime::UNow()>= this->m_next_sw_trigger)
00145                         {
00146                                 // Update next trigger timer
00147                                 this->m_next_sw_trigger= wxDateTime::UNow().Add( wxTimeSpan( 0, 0, 0, SW_TRIGGER_INTERVAL_MSEC));
00148 
00149                                 // Send SW retrigger
00150                                 this->m_parent->WriteSoftwareTrigger( );
00151                         }
00152                 }
00153                 if( num_samples_read&& this->m_parent->ScopeRefresh)
00154                 {
00155                         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
00156                         {
00157                                 ( this->m_parent->ScopeRefresh)( i, false);
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160 
00161         }
00162 exit_point:
00163                                 
00164         this->m_parent->UpdateSamplesReadyLed( false);
00165 //    this->m_parent->m_thread_exited= true;
00166         return (wxThread::ExitCode)0;
00167 }
